page.shortlink: api a5 get bmp from file function
page.description: The A5_GET_BMP_FROM_FILE() function reads a Windows Bitmap image into a blob variable.

argument.name: filename
argument.description: The path and filename of a Windows Bitmap .BMP file.

return.name: Data
return.description: A blob variable containing the contents of the bitmap image.

section.title: Example
section.description: The A5_GET_BMP_FROM_FILE() function reads a Windows Bitmap image into a blob variable.
